replies.replyComment: Mehemai mamath kamatiy naganandage pratipatti valata godak hodai.. aththatama rata hadanna uvamanava athi.. eth machna eka prayogikava karanna amaruy karanna bari thatama.. mama kiyanne mekai hodata kalpana karala balanna chandeta tiyenne masa 3 vitara tama raten bagayakvath naganandava danne ne. Eyata dinanna be kiyala oyat mamath dennama hodata dannava. Ekai mama kiyanne api ape chande nasti karaganna hoda ne. Meka antima awasthava.. mamath oya kiyana deta ekagai. Parana set ekama tamay vate inne. Ekata apita karanna tiyenne genaral election ekedi e ayava halala dana eka.. buddhimathva tiranayak ganna. Obata jaya
